list.name: Emily Carter
list.text: Exceptional pieces that elevate my wardrobe. The quality is top-notch and the customer service is impeccable.

list.name: Jessica Miller
list.text: I adore the New York style of this shop. Every purchase is a favorite, and the compliments are endless!

list.name: Sarah Johnson
list.text: Finally a shop that understands modern elegance. Perfect for the office and special occasions.

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: About Tina's NYC Style
about.description: Founded with a passion for fashion and a love for the energy of New York, our mission is to bring sophisticated and accessible style to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make luxury fashion accessible, offering high-quality pieces that inspire confidence and individuality, while maintaining a commitment to ethical practices.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We believe in creativity, quality, and customer satisfaction. Each piece is carefully selected to reflect our commitment to excellence and integrity.

footer.description: New York style at your fingertips. Unique pieces for a modern and bold elegance.
